summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by removing the standalone “Strategy Session” link from TopNav’s navLinks. REQ-2 is implemented for the shared booking handler via a new/updated bookStrategyCall() that performs pushState + popstate + scroll-to-top, and TopNav imports it, but the diff evidence is insufficient to confirm all other CTAs across the site were updated to use this handler.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clicking other CTAs that use the shared booking handler (e.g., "Book Call" in ContactOptionsGrid and CTAs in homepage sections) also navigates to "/strategy-session" from any current route.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the shared handler implementation (frontend/src/lib/strategyCall.ts) and TopNav importing it, but provides no direct code evidence that other CTA components were updated/wired to call bookStrategyCall(). The only mention is in a summaries text file, not in the actual component diffs.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking metadata updates in project_state.json (adding AR-1/AR-2/AR-3 entries and marking statuses as pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requirements focus on navigation link removal and CTA routing behavior; it does not request modifications to project state/tracking files.
